verses.t: Lord, my heart{H3820} is not haughty{H1361}, nor mine eyes{H5869} lofty{H7311}: neither do I exercise{H1980} myself in great matters{H1419}, or in things too high{H6381} for me.exerciseâ€¦: Heb. walkhigh: Heb. wonderful
Surely I have behaved{H7737} and quieted{H1826} myself{H5315}, as a child that is weaned{H1580} of his mother{H517}: my soul{H5315} is even as a weaned child{H1580}.myself: Heb. my soul
Let Israel{H3478} hope{H3176} Lordin the {H3068} from henceforth and for{H5704} ever{H5769}.henceforth: Heb. now
